fields.name: Killing Ability:
fields.value:
-Astral attack a player. You will attack them before they perform an action, i.e. if you succeed in killing them, they will also be roleblocked.
Non-Killing Abilities:
-Astral roleblock a player.
-Choose a member of the Chosen. Their Selection will be skipped the next time they would be Selected according to the order.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -You are always first in the order.
